column4: Is there a channel where I can ask Unity related questions? Still having problems with Chrome tabs
Imma give up on Unity. It can't manage tabs =/
hang on a sec. let me test.
ah, i see. When you drag them over the dock, focus wont switch. and even if there side by side, you can seperate, but not reattach. hmmmm..... anyone?
Exactly what's happening here.
it's broken. I've never had need to do it, so Ive never noticed it before. I guess i just dont browse that way
I'm a web dev and often have many tabs open anyway. I make use of this feature a lot.
someone smarter than me may be able to tell you if it's unity or chrome that you should report to, or if there is a fix, but i think its just usability
It's the same package they shove out for ever Ubuntu DE. Pretty sure it's Unity.
you could make your case to the unity devs
Is there a place I can report to them?
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/unity-2d/+bug/935713
have you tried unity 3d then? that bug seems very specific
I'm not sure what that is. I'm on a VM so idk if I can use 3D stuff.
think it depends on you VM. when you login to ubuntu, you should see options for desktop. if 3d's not there, then you need to talk to the admins.
np mate. i should point out im a fan of Unity, so i just want you to enjoy the same shortcuts i enjoy

Thanks for the help! By any chance do you know how to speed up Unity? There seems to be a terrible delay on everything I do. In other DE's, like GNOME 2/3, KDE, XFCE it's responsive but this doesn't feel responsive at all.
this is why i say im a fan and not a fanboi, because the answer, as far as i can tell, is development time
i get delays too :(
Yeah, I hope it improves. Right now I'm not sure if it's ready for my tastes, or if these problems I dislike will ever go away.
yeah, which is why i try. more users == more developers
